Text: Memo and budget for Mr lay from Waldenme if you have any questions arena cover memodoc Arena Campaign Plan Executive Summarydoc Arena Campaign Budget Draft One doc
Talking points from Dave Waldenme with questions at Arena Lay pointsdoc

Message from D Walden re Chronicle The Chronicle wants to set up editorial board meeting with Ken and Jordan and Ric Campo re arena endorsement You can call James Gibbons for the appointment at Ill be there at whatever time you set and send a briefing over before handRic needs to be there to answer the hard questions Dave

Fw Chron ed board Original Message From savont To Sent Tuesday September AM Subject Chron ed board Rosie They dont want to do the ed board meeting without Kenbut dont tell Don How about going back to the th October in the afternoon I have to get with Jordan and Campo Dave
Arena info for minoritiessee attached speaking points AfricanAmerican points on page Dave Arena Agreement Fact Sheetdoc

Bill Archer Arena spotChairman Archers ex son in law is contacting him to see if he do a spot similar to what the President did for us in We can cut the spot at Archers convenience and he will have total script approval obviously I am preparing a poll memorandum showing that this will not kill him with Republicans especially younger Republicans so he has nothing to fear I will also send him a copy of the Presidents spot from I understand that Jordan is trying to contact Archer also Anything that you could do to encourage Archer to consider this will be of great help We didnt poll on Archerbut I know his support will have a tremendous impact on the Westside and we need that Dave Walden

Arena and Bill Archerfile is a memo from our pollster on Republicans should you talk to Bill Archer Channel did a poll story on Thursday which shows the Arena with a or point lead It was their poll Our latest show about the same Dave Walden ArenaRepublican poll memodoc
Chron Ed board meeting pointsfile contains two additional economic points to highlight to the board Please give to Mr Lay before the meeting today

Arena EmergencyChronicle is developing a front page story based on a Garnett Coleman idea to change state law to allow Sports Authority tax funds to go to fund public hospitals It is my judgement that this story and the spin afterwards could easily shave points off our yes s and make this a horserace again It is even worse than the stealth tax increase in because it cuts to the heart of voters objections to the funding of sports facilities And it takes away our reponse that this money cannot legally ever be used to fund hospitals or education This was the basis of their successful attack in only this time we dont have any real response The Chronicle has delayed this story for one day I wont waste your time reviewing the various things we have done to spin this better We have done many things But it is like putting bandaids on a gaping chest wound Could you call Jack Loftis or Sweeney at the Chronicle We need to downplay it or kill it I have more info if you want to talk

Naming Rights for Football Stadiumwill be news on this subject soon that could make the Rockets payments to the city look very paltry without some good spin Since you did the Enron Deal I wanted to give you a heads up and some talking points which I will have for you Monday I think the news will keep until then

Archer arenaArcher did a great job today filming the spot Fyi we will put it up on Thursday and hold a news conference that same day with four Republican state reps and preview the spot for TV and the chronicle Would you send Archer a short note thanking him Sharon and Don Carlson his aide for their excellent effort Thanks Everything is good Our four day tracking poll we are tracking every night except friday and saturday shows us up Give the opponents all the undecided and we are still in shape to coast in a point turnaround from

Sylvia Garcia news conferenceasked me to send following information Sylvia will hold a news conference on Tuesday to endorse the arena The press advisory sent out today will cause many of them to think she is going to oppose the arena Thats good because more of the media will show up Her basic statement will be to reinforce her position as the citys fiscal watchdog that this will not take one dime away from basic services and will indeed help the city keep growing and thus have more funding for city servicesespecially the million a year that the Arena will generate in sales taxes and the increase in property values downtown It will be great if Mr Lay could show up at the event and that Sylvia for her support and objective analysis of the arena benefits

Antiarena TV campaign Cc Hotze just bought TV Looks like k total for one week Not certain Cannot tell about complete buy since it isnt in the public file Spot will run on at news and some on Letterman Will consider response if spot seems to be good Tracking polls will follow I am putting Archer on Thursday ahead of schedule to counter Will advise
opponents TV script Cc the text of their spot Attn PSI dub will arrive tomorrow

Re opponents TV script Cc the attachment Original Message From Dave Walden To Glenn Smith George Postolos Dale Laine Bill Miller Margie Becker Cc Ken Lay Don Jordan Sent Wednesday October PM Subject opponents TV script Here is the text of their spot Attn PSI dub will arrive tomorrow Arena opponents script TVdoc

Fw Opponents TV BuyOriginal Message From Dave Walden To Angela Blakeney Cc George Postolos Sent Wednesday October PM Subject Re Opponents TV Buy Here what they have actually bought Total Theyve told the stations that they expect to add time to the buy But that will be very difficult for them to do next week and it will not be all that much any way The Carson Group is a one man operation out of a cat ridden house somewhere out west Original Message From Angela Blakeney To Sent Wednesday October PM Subject Opponents TV Buy Our inhouse media guy says the TV is being placed by the Carson Group The Tv stations have said they will not tell us how much has been spent on the buy over the phone but they will show us in person if we send someone to the stations Have you found out any more information Angela Blakeney Chief of Staff Houston Rockets Comets ThunderBears phone fax

Fw Chron Story on Misleading Ads Cc the Chronicle story on the oppositions misleading and outright false ads Dave Original Message From Jeff Balke To David Walden Andrea Bouchey Anglea Blakeney Sent Friday October PM Subject Chron Story on Misleading Ads WOW That might be the best story weve gotten If you havent seen it yet click the link below csCDAstoryhtsmetropolitan Jeff

Arena poll trackingoffice can open up the attached file to view our tracking as of last night Please call with questions The ch survey had a wider spread but I dont think it is accurate The Chronicle will be calling tomorrow with their poll numbers Their poll is a creation of Dick Murray and Bob Stein I would expect them to show us in a much tighter race These guys are not always accurate remember their against poll on baseball in

Attached are the timeline charts thru Nov st interviewingOriginal Message From Michael D Baselice To George Postolos Email Angela Blakeney Email Dave Walden Email Glenn Smith Email Dale Laine Email Sent Thursday November AM Subject SORRY EVERYONE Attached are the timeline charts thru Nov st interviewing MICHAEL BASELICE Baselice Associates Inc Spicewood Springs Road Suite O Austin TX Phone Fax email NOVppt

Fw Moving Averages thru November nd Cc pollsters last coment Original Message From Michael D Baselice To George Postolos Email Angela Blakeney Email Dave Walden Email Glenn Smith Email Dale Laine Email Sent Friday November AM Subject Moving Averages thru November nd We our best night last night For Against for a day roll of For Against on the ballot We also had our best night on the intensity Strongly For Strongly Against for a day roll of Strongly For Strongly Against on the ballot Impressions of what was seen read or head were more likely less likely to support the building of a new arena on Thursday This brings the day roll to more likely less likely We are in control of the message environment and this is why we are doing so well on the ballot We are going to win this thing ladies and gents MICHAEL BASELICE Baselice Associates Inc Spicewood Springs Road Suite O Austin TX Phone Fax email ROLLDOC

Fw Timeline Charts for arena voteare our final tracking results Our last day was Sunday Dave Walden Original Message From Michael D Baselice To George Postolos Email Angela Blakeney Email Dave Walden Email Glenn Smith Email Dale Laine Email Sent Monday November AM Subject Timeline Charts MICHAEL BASELICE Baselice Associates Inc Spicewood Springs Road Suite O Austin TX Phone Fax email NOVppt

Fw PREDICTION for ARENA PROPour pollsters prediction below DAVE Original Message From Michael D Baselice To Dave Walden Email Cc George Postolos Email Angela Blakeney Email Glenn Smith Email Dale Laine Email Sent Monday November PM Subject PREDICTION for ARENA PROP Baselice Associates Inc predicts that we will win the Arena Proposition with of the vote MICHAEL BASELICE Baselice Associates Inc Spicewood Springs Road Suite O Austin TX Phone Fax email
